def press_button(n):
  return sum((n-i)*(i+1)-i for i in range(n))
press_button=lambda n:sum(i*(n-i) for i in range(1,n))+n

def press_button(n):
    return n + sum(i * (n-i) for i in range(1, n))

def press_button(n):
  return sum(i * (n - i) + 1 for i in range(1, n + 1))

def press_button(n):
    return n+sum([i*(n-i) for i in range(1,n+1)])
